rows.label: tev000792_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, it's [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0002
rows.name:
I was just asking the nice lady here to pull together
some extra first-aid kits for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0003
rows.name:
My next mission could involve run-ins with a pair of
tyrants—possibly at the same time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0004
rows.name:
And if we end up in a tough fight, we're likely to suffer
multiple injuries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_JNK0010
rows.name: Envy

rows.label: tev000792_SEL0011
rows.name: Say you're jealous of the exciting battle that awaits him.

rows.label: tev000792_JNK0020
rows.name: Aid

rows.label: tev000792_SEL0021
rows.name: Offer to come along and help out.

rows.label: tev000792_JNK0030
rows.name: Admire

rows.label: tev000792_SEL0031
rows.name: Praise Doug about his concern for his comrades.

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0005
rows.name: Wow. You really are one of a kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0006
rows.name:
Even the Harriers are quaking in their boots,
and I can't say I'm brimming with confidence either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0007
rows.name:
I don't know anyone who's as perfectly suited to being
a BLADE as you. It's like you were born to do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0008
rows.name:
Part of me wishes I could stand back and let you lead
the charge, but we have our own pride to think about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0009
rows.name:
So I'm going to handle this—and I'm coming back
without a single fatality![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0010
rows.name:
There's a pretty sweet paycheck waiting for us at the
end of all this, so next time I see you, dinner's on me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0011
rows.name: Well, I've got to get going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0012
rows.name:
Thanks for lighting a fire under me, though.
I'm suddenly in the mood for a fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0013
rows.name: Oh, I don't think we need to go that far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0014
rows.name: I have my job to do, and you've got yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0015
rows.name:
I'm grateful that you'd look out for us like that,
but it isn't right to let you carry the whole weight
of BLADE's mission on your shoulders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0016
rows.name: You have to trust that I can handle this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0017
rows.name:
Of course, if it all goes horribly wrong, we'll call for
reinforcements. In that case, you might get a chance to
help out after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0018
rows.name: Oh, that reminds me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0019
rows.name:
I've got the mission under control, but there's something
else that I could use your help with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0020
rows.name:
It's a significantly greater threat than the mission I just
told you about. It might not even be an exaggeration
to say that it concerns the fate of humanity itself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0021
rows.name: What I'm talking about is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0022
rows.name: The development of the Skell flight module![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0023
rows.name:
There aren't enough replacement mimeosomes in the
world for me to survive these field tests Lin's running.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0024
rows.name:
...What? Hey, I thought you wanted to help!
Don't blow me off now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0025
rows.name:
Hey, listen! I'm being serious here.
Er, [ST:playername ]...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0026
rows.name: That's hardly something you should be praising me for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0027
rows.name:
I know all of us have a moral duty to serve the whole
of humanity, but I can't wrap my head around that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0028
rows.name: It's just way too much to process.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0029
rows.name:
What I CAN wrap my head around are the comrades
fighting by my side—and I include you in that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0030
rows.name:
So I'm going to do everything I can to aid and
protect them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0031
rows.name:
And hopefully, in doing so, I'll be serving humanity
as a whole.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0032
rows.name:
But let's be honest—I'm not looking too far beyond the
friends beside me and the balance in my bank account.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000792_MSG0033
rows.name:
And really, looking out for your friends is the least
any of us could do.[ST:wait ]
